lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Sunday about the first round of the N.H.L. draft misidentified the teams that drafted Alex Pietrangelo and Luke Schenn. Pietrangelo was selected fourth by the St. Louis Blues, not the Toronto Maple Leafs. Schenn was selected next by Toronto, not by the Columbus Blue Jackets. The article also misstated the outcome of a trade between the Maple Leafs and the Islanders. The Maple Leafs gained the fifth pick of the first round from the Islanders, not the fourth pick.
